attributes.action: Grant a Knighthood to Ken Furphy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Booby Robson apart, there can be no more experienced and well respected coach in football than Ken Furphy.  Ken who ? you may say....well Ken is still as enthusiastic about the game now, as he was when making his debut for Everton in 1950. 

Although he did not enjoy a great Playing Career, his Coaching Roles have seen him travel the world with Workington, Blackburn, Sheff Utd.,New York Cosmos, Miami Toros, Detroit Express, Washington Diplomats.

He also Managed the Bermudan National Team, Englan U/21's and Team USA.

Nowadays, Ken at 77 still keeps his interest in the game alive, asa summariser on BBC Devon.

All this.....and he is a smashing guy, too !
